class denver.metrics.OnetNetMetrics[source]¶

Bases: allennlp.training.metrics.metric.Metric

A class Metics for OneNet model.

get_metric(reset=False, mode=False)[source]¶

Function get metric, return a Dict per label containing following the span based metrics:

precision : float

recall : float

f1-measure : float

Additionally, an overall key is included, which provides the precision,

recall and f1-measure for all spans.

reset()[source]¶

Reset any accumulators or internal state.

denver.metrics.get_metric(y_true, y_pred)[source]¶

Function to get metrics evaluation.

Parameters

  • y_pred – Ground truth (correct) target values.

  • y_true – Estimated targets as returned by a classifier.

Returns

acc, f1, precision, recall
